cards.title: The Fool
cards.text: A new beginning, adventure, and potential.
choices: A fresh start is on the horizon.
Embrace the unknown and take a leap of faith.
New opportunities are coming your way.

cards.title: The Magician
choices: You have all the tools you need to succeed.
Harness your inner power and make things happen.
Your skills and talents are your greatest assets.

cards.title: The High Priestess
choices: Trust your intuition and inner wisdom.
Secrets and mysteries are being revealed.
Listen to your inner voice for guidance.

cards.title: The Empress
choices: Nurture your ideas and watch them grow.
Abundance and prosperity are coming your way.
Embrace your creative and nurturing side.

cards.title: The Emperor
choices: Take charge and assert your authority.
Structure and discipline will lead to success.
You have the power to create order from chaos.

cards.title: The Hierophant
choices: Seek guidance from a trusted mentor.
Embrace tradition and spiritual wisdom.
Follow the path of knowledge and learning.

cards.title: The Lovers
choices: A deep connection is forming.
Harmony and balance in relationships.
Love and partnership are in the air.

cards.title: The Chariot
choices: Stay focused and determined.
Victory is within your grasp.
Take control and steer your course.

cards.title: Strength
choices: You have the strength to overcome challenges.
Patience and courage will see you through.
Inner strength is your greatest ally.

cards.title: The Hermit
choices: Take time for introspection and self-discovery.
Solitude can bring clarity and wisdom.
Seek guidance from within.

cards.title: Wheel of Fortune
choices: Embrace the changes coming your way.
Life is a cycle of ups and downs.
Destiny is at play in your life.

cards.title: Justice
choices: Seek fairness and balance in all things.
Truth and justice will prevail.
Make decisions with integrity and honesty.

cards.title: The Hanged Man
choices: Let go of what no longer serves you.
A new perspective can bring clarity.
Sacrifice may be necessary for growth.

cards.title: Death
choices: Embrace transformation and change.
Endings make way for new beginnings.
Let go of the old to make room for the new.

cards.title: Temperance
choices: Seek balance and harmony in your life.
Moderation is key to success.
Blend different aspects of your life.

cards.title: The Devil
choices: Break free from what binds you.
Beware of temptations and addictions.
Materialism can be a trap.

cards.title: The Tower
choices: Expect sudden changes and revelations.
Upheaval can lead to new insights.
Embrace the chaos for growth.

cards.title: The Star
choices: Hope and inspiration are guiding you.
Find serenity in the midst of chaos.
Look to the stars for guidance.

cards.title: The Moon
choices: Trust your intuition and instincts.
Illusions may be clouding your judgment.
Explore your subconscious mind.

cards.title: The Sun
choices: Joy and success are within reach.
Positivity will lead to great outcomes.
Embrace the warmth and light.

cards.title: Judgement
choices: Answer the call of your inner voice.
Rebirth and renewal are at hand.
Seek absolution and forgiveness.

cards.title: The World
choices: Completion and fulfillment are near.
Celebrate your achievements.
You have reached a significant milestone.
